name: Astro Portal
description:
A game made for the Trijam game jam in just 3 hours. The theme was unconventional modes of transport!

Credits:

Art/SFX by Desmodium Games and James W-D

Code/Gameplay by Desmodium Games 

How to play:

Your space ship is falling through the void of space, luckily you have to portals it is perpetually falling through. You can control these portals and use them to dodge the incoming asteroids! The longer you survive the higher your score.

Controls: Left/Right = A/D
